title: Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbell, Neoprene Coated, Various Sets and Weights available
descriptions:
Stay active at home with the Amazon Basics Easy Grip Workout Dumbbells.

What you get:
- Two dumbbells. Each one weighs 10 pounds.
- Navy Blue color with easy-to-see weight numbers printed on the ends.
- Nonslip, soft neoprene coating that’s gentle on hands and easy to hold.
- Hexagon shape so they won’t roll away. They stay where you set them.
- Color-coded for easy size recognition. Multiple sizes are available if you want lighter or heavier options.

Why you’ll like them:
- Comfortable, secure grip helps prevent slipping, even if your hands get a bit sweaty.
- Easy to pick up and set down, with a shape that keeps them in place for safer storage.
- Great for simple home exercises to build strength, improve balance, and support everyday activities like lifting groceries or getting up from a chair.
- Durable and long lasting.

How to start:
- Begin with short sessions: 5–10 minutes.
- Do slow, controlled movements.
- Breathe steadily and rest as needed.
- If 10 pounds feels heavy, choose a lighter size first; you can always move up later.

Simple care:
- Wipe with a damp cloth and let air-dry.

Feel stronger, steadier, and more confident with a pair of easy-to-hold dumbbells designed to make exercise straightforward and safe.
